title: Drow Half-Elf
content:
Drow Half-Elf Racial Features Base Racial Speed Civil Militia Darkvision Fey Ancestry Subrace Traits Drow Magic: Dancing Lights, Faerie Fire, Darkness

Base Racial Speed Civil Militia Darkvision Fey Ancestry

Drow Magic: Dancing Lights, Faerie Fire, Darkness

Drow Half-Elf is a Subrace of Half-Elf in Baldur's Gate 3. Drow Half-Elf possesses the ability to gain Dancing Lights Cantrip as a subracial bonus. While creating your Character in Baldur's Gate 3, you can choose between 11 different types
